Intimidating Glare: May use glare to Demoralize
Quick Alchemy: May use batches of infused reagents to create 1 alchemical item of up to level 18 for 1 turn
Raging Intimidation: May use Demoralize during rage
Student Of The Canon: All critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Cannot fail to Recall Knowledge about own faith
Untrained Improvisation: +18 on untrained skill checks
Combat
Hit Points: 242 Armor Class: 36 (dexterity; expert) Class DC: Alchemist: 15 (intelligence; trained); Barbarian: 16 (strength; trained); Champion: 16 (dexterity; trained); Rogue: 36 (dexterity; expert)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Alchemist Dedication: Attack Trained (Alchemical Bombs)/Class Trained (Alchemist)
Barbarian Dedication: Class Trained (Barbarian)
Barbarian Resiliency: +18 Hit Points
Champion Dedication: Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor)/Class Trained (Champion)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +54
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Far Lobber: Bombs have 30' range
Greater Weapon Specialization: Increased Weapon Specialization effects
Incredible Initiative: +2 Initiative
Light Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Master Tricks: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Rapier; Sap; Shortbow; Shortsword; Unarmed Attacks)
Rogue Expertise: Class Expert (Rogue)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Toughness: +18 Hit Points
Weapon Proficiency (Pick): Attack Trained (Pick)
Weapon Tricks: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Rapier; Sap; Shortbow; Shortsword; Unarmed Attacks)
Bestial Rage: Fist inflicts 1d12B HP during rage
Debilitating Strike: Successful Strike against a flat-footed foe inflicts choice of -10 Speed or enfeebled 1
Defensive Roll: May negate half damage from an attack that would reduce self to 0 HP as a free action 1/10 min
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer flat-footed to foes of equal or lower level
Divine Ally (Blade): May apply choice of disrupting, ghost touch, returning, or shifting to a weapon chosen each day; also gains critical specialization effect
Double Debilitation: Debilitating Strike inflicts choice of two debilitations
Dread Striker: Frightened foes are flat-footed vs. self attacks
Glimpse Of Redemption: R15' May use a Reaction to negate damage to a struck ally or to grant the ally damage resistance 20 and inflict enfeebled 2 on triggering foe for 1 rd (foe's choice)
Mobility: May Stride half Speed without triggering reactions
Powerful Sneak: May change sneak attack damage to match weapon type
Quick Draw: May use 1 action to draw a weapon and Strike
Rage: May gain 21 temporary Hit Points and +2 HP melee damage (agile weapon +1 HP), and suffer -1 AC and no concentration actions, for 1 min; requires 1 min between rages
Reactive Interference: May use a Reaction to prevent a foe Reaction; requires an attack against a higher-level foe
Scoundrel: A successful Feint inflicts flat-footed on foe vs. self attacks (critical success all attacks) for until the end of your next turn
Sneak Attack: +4d6 HP damage vs. flat-footed foe with agile, finesse, or ranged weapons
Surprise Attack: May use Deception or Stealth for initiative to inflict flat-footed on creatures that haven't acted
Tactical Debilitations: Debilitating Strike may prevent reactions or flanking
Twist The Knife: May inflict 4 HP persistent bleed damage with a sneak attack
Weapon Specialization: +4/+6/+8 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency
Weapon Tricks: Critical hits vs. a flat-footed foe with unarmed attacks and agile, finesse, and rogue weapons inflict its critical specialization effect
Save: Fortitude: +27 (constitution; master); Reflex: +30 (dexterity; legendary); Will: +28 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Evasion: Save Master (Reflex)
Great Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Improved Evasion: Save Legendary (Reflex)
Juggernaut's Fortitude: Save Master (Fortitude)
Slippery Mind: Save Master (Will)
Cognitive Loophole: May use a Reaction to suppress a mental effect until the end of your next turn
Evasion: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental control are critical successes/Foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Improved Evasion: Critical failures on Reflex saves are normal failures/Suffers half normal damage from failed Reflex saves
Slippery Mind: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Magic
Spell Slots: O0: 2; O1: 2; O2: 2; O3: 2; O4: 2; O6: 1; O7: 1 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Occult: +27 (charisma; master) Spell DC: Occult: 37 (charisma; master)
Spells:
Counter Performance
Inspire Courage
Magic Notes:
Bard Dedication: Spell Trained (Occult)/Knows 2 Occult cantrips
Basic Bard Spellcasting: Knows 1 3rd-level, 1 2nd-level, and 1 1st-level bard spell
Counter Perform: Knows the Counter Performance spell/Has a Focus Pool with 1 Focus Point
Expert Bard Spellcasting: Spell Expert (Occult)/Knows 1 6th-level, 1 5th-level, and 4th-level bard spell
Inspirational Performance: Knows the Inspire Courage cantrip
Master Bard Spellcasting: Spell Master (Occult)/Knows 7th-level bard spell
Occult Breadth: +1 Occult spell slot of each level up to 5
Magical Trickster: Spell attacks vs. flat-footed foes inflict sneak attack damage
Redeemer: Knows the Lay On Hands spell
Notes
Validation Errors: Class Feats Allocation: 17 available vs. 57 allocated
